text: Tiniharule aphno vicarama yo pani bhandai chanh ki ‘‘yo janavara ra kheti varjita ra suraksita chan jasako upabhoga sabaiko lagi jayaja chaina kevala tyasa vyaktile upabhoga garna sakcha jasala'i hamile cahanechaum.’’ Ra kehi caupaya yasta chan ki tinako pithyumma cadhna va kehi kura boka'una roka laga'i'eko cha. Ra kehi pasuharu yasta chan jasamathi (katne jab'ha garne bela) allahako nama lidainan. Yi sabai allahamathi yiniharule raceka asatya kura hun. Allahale tiniharula'i tinako jhuthako pratiphala chitai nai dinecha
